title: Free Guide to Negotiating Flexible Working
author: WORK180
body:
DCC's Flexible Working Week and Your Free Guide "Negotiating Flexible Working"

DCC's inaugural Flexible Working Week is on June 19-23, 2017. During this week, DCC declares a safe week to discuss how your role may be flexible with your employer. Check out our list of DCC's Flexible Working Ambassadors to find out who supports flexible working and encourages you to request flex.

Join our conversation on social media! 

#FlexibleWorkingWeek

Flex Able Certification

Would you like to know who truly walks the talk when it comes to offering flexible work? DCC’s Flex Able Certification helps job seekers know what companies place a strong focus on flexibility in addition to being an employer of choice for women. Learn more about it here.

Requesting Flex - The Right Way (Download our Free Guide!)

But how do you request flex if you do not already work for a DCC Endorsed Employer? This is one of our most frequently asked questions by our DCC network. To help you, we developed a guide to give you the tools you need to request flexibility at work – the right way. 

Here is a free download of our guide to negotiating flexible work arrangements. 









About DCC Jobs

DCC Jobs is a jobs board with a difference! We pre-screen employers on paid parental leave, pay equity, flexible working arrangements and much more. This information is not publicly listed elsewhere and is an essential tool in your job search when assessing employers. Set up your job alert with 1 click now. ​
